interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Brazilian Hair Ombre Bundles Deep Wave Human Hair 3 Bundles T1B-4-27 Ombre Virgin Hair 3 Bundles 100G/Pcs Unprocessed Remy Human Hair Double Weft Weave Three Tone Light Brown Mix Blonde（16 18 20 Inch）
Review Date: 2022/02/21
Store: Agnes
Product Description: ["Choose Agnes Hair,Choose Rest Assured!We Are Located In Xuchang,Henan Province,China'S Factory;Global Wig Base,With More Than 20 Years Of Wig Production Experience!The Main Products Of The Factory Are Hair Bundles,Closure Front,Hair Wigs Etc   Hair Material:100 Percent Unprocessed Brazilian Virgin Human Hair Ombre Highlight Bundles   Material Grade: 10A Virgin Human Hair 3 Bundles Hair Weft: Machine Double Weft   Hair Advantage:Nature Look,Suit for Any Occasion Hair Color: Three Tone #T1b-4-27.   Warm Tips: If There Is Any Requirement, Please Feel Free To Contact Us Before You Place Orders.We Will Send the Wig In Medium Cap Size and Medium Brown Cap Color If Not Receive Change Message   QA: Q1:Is this 1100 Percent Human Hair A:Yes.Testing by BURNING- Human hair will show white smoke while burning and then turn to ash; Synthetic hair will show black smoke and will be a sticky ball after burning.  Q2:Hair Smell A:1100 Percent chemical free,it may have local shampoo smell,but can be removed by cowashing with shampoo and conditioner.   Q3: How long does it last A:This hair can last for long time depending on how you maintain it.Usually my customers use for more than a year.Contact Us To Explain The Suitable Use Method For You!   Q4:How Many Bundles Do I need for A Full Head A:Normally 3 bundles is enough for the Full Head.If You Like Thicker or Need Longer Hair,It's Better to Wear one More Bundle."]
Average Rating: 3.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Agnes', 'Color': 'brown', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '12.2 x 9.84 x 2.09 inches; 11.68 Ounces', 'UPC': '735209921787'}
Review Text: What I didn’t like about the hair is, I purchased deep wave and when I added it in m hair, it was loose wave. The bottom color of the hair is very blonde so you will have to tone it down with a light brown rinse. If you are looking for curly hair, look for the kinky curly in two tone .
Review Title: Two tone weaving hair is ok
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------

I really enjoying it I love this hair, very soft and natural Selina, Brazilian Curly Hair Bundles, 1 Bundle,cheap bundles, Kinky Curly, human hair bundles, Remy Hair bundles, virgin curly hair bundles, 100 Gram/Bundle (18", Natural Black) Selina {'Brand': 'Selina', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '18 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 5 x 2.6 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '824918169808'} This hair was very soft and natural. Very thin but nice hair Nice hair BeautyGirl Hair Brazilian Water Wave 4 Bundles 16 18 20 22inches Unprocessed Water Wave Curly Human Hair Weave Brazilian Water Wave Virgin Hair Bundles Natural Color BeautyGirl {'Brand': 'BeautyGirl', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '22 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Curly', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '10.94 x 7.68 x 2.76 inches; 10.23 Ounces'} Your ad said Brazilian Water Wave human hair. This is not Human hair. I received a blend of synthetic hair. This was false advertisement. Not good.

Taylor Very disappointment with this hair Brazilian Kinky Weave Hair Virgin Hair Kinky Curly Remy Brazillian 100% Human Hair Weave Jerry Curly Virgin Remy Human Hair Bundles Brown Human Hair Weave kinky curly 18 20 22 Inch NIUDINNG NIUDINNG {'Brand': 'NIUDINNG', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '22 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Material Feature': 'Durable'} Well, I have tried many of Amazon Weave hair and this was not a good selection. It was very thin and stringy, not good quality. I put one bundle on and I am sure it is not human hair. I returned the package back to the seller for a refund. Just my opinion Brazilian Kinky weave hair is not as good as it looks NiegMeag 20 Inch Kinky Curly Bundles Wave 1 Human Hair 8A Grade 100% Brazilian Unprocessed Virgin Remy Extension Weave Natural Black Can Be Dyed and Bleached, Bundle NiegMeag ["Hair Texture: Curly Wave Human Hair Bundles.Material: 100% Unprocessed Brazilian Human Hair.Human Hair Type: Brazilian Remy Human Hair. Weave Hair Human Bundles.Color: Natural Black ColorUnit Weight: 1 Bundles ,95-100g/piece.Hair Weft: Machine Double Wefts.Can Be Permed: Yes,But Please Be Careful Not to Exceed 125°F ! Otherwise it Will Damage The Hair !Hair Smell: It May Have Local Shampoo Smell, but It Will Disappear Fast After Co-Wash, Don'T Worry.How To Take Care Of The Hair?1. Wash The Hair Regularly.2. Detangle Hair Gently Before Washing. Do Not Rub or Twist It.3. Add Mild Shampoo To Cool Water and Swish Hair Till Clean. Rinse Thoroughly.4. Blot Out Excess Water With Towel and Allow Hair to Dry Naturally. Do Not Expose to The Sun.5. Comb Hair Gently With Wide Toothed Comb or With Your Fingers . 6. Brush Straighter Hair in a Downward Motion Straight With The Ends. FAQ:Q1: Will It Shedding?A1: For New Hair, A Few Strands of Hair Initial Shedding is Normal Like Our Own Hair. The Hair is Double Machine Weft to Avoid Shedding.Hair Shedding Can Be Caused by Many Things. Heat Damage From Blow-Dryers, Curling Irons, And Flatirons, As Well As Coloring Will Result in Breakage.Q2: Return/Refund Policy?A2: You Can Return to us if You or Your Family Doesnt Like Our Hair .But Don'T Break The Package."] {'Brand': 'NiegMeag', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Installation Type': 'Weave', 'UPC': '679265464058'} Very bad quality hair Bad quality Brazilian Hair Ombre Bundles Deep Wave Human Hair 3 Bundles T1B-4-27 Ombre Virgin Hair 3 Bundles 100G/Pcs Unprocessed Remy Human Hair Double Weft Weave Three Tone Light Brown Mix Blonde（16 18 20 Inch） Agnes ["Choose Agnes Hair,Choose Rest Assured!We Are Located In Xuchang,Henan Province,China'S Factory;Global Wig Base,With More Than 20 Years Of Wig Production Experience!The Main Products Of The Factory Are Hair Bundles,Closure Front,Hair Wigs Etc Hair Material:100 Percent Unprocessed Brazilian Virgin Human Hair Ombre Highlight Bundles Material Grade: 10A Virgin Human Hair 3 Bundles Hair Weft: Machine Double Weft Hair Advantage:Nature Look,Suit for Any Occasion Hair Color: Three Tone #T1b-4-27. profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Purchase Preference:** The user remains dedicated to human hair extensions, particularly curly textures. However, they have recently expressed disappointment with new brands, leading to an increased skepticism towards product claims.

- **Quality Expectation:** The user demands high standards of softness, durability, and a natural appearance in hair products. Recent purchases have reinforced their insistence on superior quality and authenticity, given past discrepancies.

- **Rating Trend:** The user's ratings continue to reflect dissatisfaction, consistently marked by low scores due to product quality issues and misleading marketing. There is a clear pattern of critical evaluation that highlights their growing discontent.

- **Brand Affinity:** The user is open to trying new brands but approaches them with heightened scrutiny, increasingly wary of claims that lack transparency following recent unsatisfactory experiences.

- **Hair Color Preference:** The user prefers natural hair colors, with a notable concern for accurate color representation based on recent purchases.

- **Length Preference:** While the user typically favors 18-inch extensions, they are willing to explore longer lengths, as previously demonstrated.

- **Interaction Style:** Recent reviews convey frustration, indicating a marked shift from previous positive feedback to a more discerning evaluation, especially regarding texture and color accuracy.

Overall, the user has become more critical and cautious in their hair product selection, emphasizing the need for quality and honest marketing due to multiple negative experiences.
